overview: Dos plebes is a world-renowned film with high ratings.  The release date of this film is in year 2000.  John Solis, Horacio Almada, Ángel Soto, Fernando Sáenz, Bernabé Melendrez are the actors and actresses in charge of giving life to the characters that the story tells.
tagline: Mexico has been the country in charge of bringing this story to life.
title: Two Kids
